mapper.select: select a.c_cct, b.c_sesion, a.ce_actividad, case when b.id_detalle==1 then (select descrip_categoria from c_categorias where c_categoria = a.ce_actividad ) else "" end categoria ,nom_otra_categoria, b.id_detalle, b.id_objetivo, case when b.id_objetivo is not null then (select descrip_actividad from c_actividades co where co.c_actividad = b.id_objetivo) else b.objetivo end actividad, b.meta, b.fuente, b.monto1, b.monto_str1, b.monto2, b.monto_str2, b.cumplio, case when b.id_detalle==1 then b.monto1 else null end monto1acta, case when b.id_detalle==1 then b.monto_str1 else null end montostr1acta, case when b.id_detalle==1 then b.monto2 else null end monto2acta, case when b.id_detalle==1 then b.monto_str2 else null end montostr2acta from ce_actividad a, ce_actividad_detalle b where b.c_cct = a.c_cct and b.ce_actividad = a.ce_actividad and a.c_cct = #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.c_sesion in (2,4) order by 3
select c_cct, 4 as c_sesion, 2 as c_sesion_1ra_sesion from ce_sesion where c_cct = #{cCct} and c_sesion in (2,3) group by c_cct
select c_actividad, nom_actividad from c_act_sesion where num_pestania in ( select c_actividad from ce_act_sesion where c_cct = #{cCct} and c_sesion=4 ) order by c_actividad

select a.c_sesion,a.c_Programa, c.nom_programa, monto, monto_str,nom_otro_programa, recibido, recibido_str from ce_programas a, c_programa c where a.c_programa = c.c_programa and a.c_cct = #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.c_sesion in ( 2,3,4) and tipo_programa = 0

select a.c_sesion,a.c_Programa, c.nom_programa, monto, monto_str,nom_otro_programa, recibido, recibido_str from ce_programas a, c_programa c where a.c_programa = c.c_programa and a.c_cct = #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.c_sesion in ( 2, 3 ,4) and tipo_programa = 1

select a.c_sesion,a.c_Programa, c.nom_programa, monto, monto_str,nom_otro_programa, recibido, recibido_str from ce_programas a, c_programa c where a.c_programa = c.c_programa and a.c_cct = #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.c_sesion in ( 2, 3 ,4) and tipo_programa = 2

select a.c_sesion,a.c_Programa, c.nom_programa, monto, monto_str,nom_otro_programa, recibido, recibido_str from ce_programas a, c_programa c where a.c_programa = c.c_programa and a.c_cct = #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.c_sesion in ( 2, 3 ,4) and tipo_programa = 3

select a.c_Programa, c.nom_programa, a.nom_otro_programa, d.c_sesion, b.id_detalle, b.id_objetivo, b.meta, d.seguimiento,d.avance, case when b.id_objetivo is not null then (select descrip_objetivo from c_objetivos co where co.c_objetivo = b.id_objetivo ) else b.objetivo end objetivo, a.tipo_programa from ce_programas a, ce_programas_detalle b, c_programa c, outer ce_programas_seguimiento d where d.c_cct = a.c_cct
and d.c_programa = b.c_programa and d.id_detalle = b.id_detalle and b.c_cct = a.c_cct and b.c_sesion = a.c_sesion and b.c_programa = a.c_programa and a.c_programa = c.c_programa and a.c_cct = #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select b.c_sesion,a.c_participacion, a.descrip_participacion, b.tprograma_federales, b.tprograma_estatales, b.tprograma_municipales, b.tprograma_osc, case when b.tprograma_federales=1 then 'Si' else 'No' end rprogramaFederales, case when b.tprograma_estatales=1 then 'Si' else 'No' end rprogramaEstatales, case when b.tprograma_municipales=1 then 'Si' else 'No' end rprogramaMunicipales, case when b.tprograma_osc=1 then 'Si' else 'No' end rprogramaOsc from c_participacion a, outer ce_programas_participacion b where a.c_participacion = b.c_participacion and b.c_cct = #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.c_sesion=4

select a.id_accion,accion,recomendacion,avance_accion,avance_recomendacion, b.c_sesion from ce_accion a, outer ce_accion_seguimiento b where a.id_accion=b.id_accion and a.c_cct=b.c_cct and a.c_cct= #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.c_cct, b.c_sesion, ce_comites, a.id_comite, nom_comite, num_integrantes, nom_presidente, id_calidad, nomcalidad, id_acuerdo, acuerdo,nom_otro_comite, accion1,accion2,accion3,accion4,accion5,actividad_comite1 from ce_comites a, outer ce_comites_seguimiento b where a.c_cct = b.c_cct and a.id_comite = b.id_comite and a.c_sesion in ( 2,3,4) and a.c_cct=#{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by 4

select b.*, a.descrip_candidato ,c.nom_estimulo from c_candidatos a, ce_estimulos b, c_estimulos c where b.candidato = a.c_candidato and b.c_estimulo=c.c_estimulo and c_cct = #{cCct} and c_sesion in ( 3,4)
select c_cct, c_sesion, csc_asunto, asunto, acuerdo from ce_asunto where c_cct = #{cCct} and c_sesion in (4) order by c_sesion
select * from ce_preguntas2 where cct_id= #{cCct} and c_sesion=4
select * from ce_contraloria_comite where c_cct= #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c_sesion=4
select * from ce_actividad_comite where c_cct= #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c_sesion=4
select * from ce_programa_comite where c_cct= #{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c_sesion=4

select ce.csc_integrante,ce.paterno_integrante,ce.materno_integrante,ce.nombre_integrante from ce_integrante ce where ce.csc_integrante not in (select idconsejero from ce_candidatopresi cec , ce_integrante cei where cec.votos =(select max(votos) from ce_candidatopresi pre where pre.c_cct=cec.c_cct and pre.c_sesion=cec.c_sesion) and csc_integrante=idconsejero and cec.c_cct=cei.c_cct and cec.c_cct=ce.c_cct) and ce.csc_integrante not in (select idconsejero from ce_candidatosecre sec , ce_integrante cei where sec.votos =(select max(votos) from ce_candidatosecre se where se.c_cct=sec.c_cct and se.c_sesion=sec.c_sesion) and csc_integrante=idconsejero and sec.c_cct=cei.c_cct and sec.c_cct=ce.c_cct) and ce.c_cct=#{cCct}

select a.c_cct, a.c_sesion, ce_comites, a.id_comite, nom_comite, num_integrantes, nom_presidente, id_calidad, nomcalidad, id_acuerdo, acuerdo,nom_otro_comite, accion1,accion2,accion3,accion4,accion5 from ce_comites a, outer ce_comites_seguimiento b where a.c_cct = b.c_cct and a.id_comite = b.id_comite and a.c_cct=#{cCct,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by 4

select case when tipo_programa==0 then "Programas Federales"
when tipo_programa==1 then "Programas Estatales"
when tipo_programa==2 then "Programas Municipales"
when tipo_programa==3 then "Programas OSC" else "" end categoriaprograma, tipo_programa, case when c.nom_programa like 'Otro' then c.nom_programa||': '||nom_otro_programa else c.nom_programa end as nom_programa, sum(monto) as recabado, sum(recibido) as ejercido
from ce_programas a, c_programa c where a.c_programa = c.c_programa and a.c_cct =#{cCct}
group by tipo_programa, c.nom_programa,nom_otro_programa order by tipo_programa

select cct.cve_cct, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps1 where cps1.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps1.c_sesion=4 and (cps1.seguimiento like '21,-' or cps1.seguimiento like '21,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '%,-21,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '24,-' or cps1.seguimiento like '24,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '%,-24,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '25,-' or cps1.seguimiento like '25,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '%,-25,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '26,-' or cps1.seguimiento like '26,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '%,-26,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '27,-' or cps1.seguimiento like '27,-%' or cps1.seguimiento like '%,-27,-%') and cps1.c_programa=3)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyoespecie1, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps2 where cps2.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps2.c_sesion=4 and (cps2.seguimiento like '22,-' or cps2.seguimiento like '22,-%' or cps2.seguimiento like '%,-22,-%' or cps2.seguimiento like '23,-' or cps2.seguimiento like '23,-%' or cps2.seguimiento like '%,-23,-%') and cps2.c_programa=3)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyotecnico1, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas cp1 where cp1.c_cct=cct.c_cct and monto>=0 and cp1.c_programa=3)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyofinaciero1, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps3 where cps3.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps3.c_sesion=4 and (cps3.seguimiento like '1,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '1,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-1,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '3,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '3,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-3,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '4,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '4,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-4,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '5,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '5,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-5,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '6,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '6,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-6,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '7,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '7,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-7,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '8,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '8,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-8,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '9,-' or cps3.seguimiento like '9,-%' or cps3.seguimiento like '%,-9,-%') and cps3.c_programa=1)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyoespecie2, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps4 where cps4.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps4.c_sesion=4 and (cps4.seguimiento like '2,-' or cps4.seguimiento like '2,-%'or cps4.seguimiento like '%,-2,-%') and cps4.c_programa=1)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyotecnico2, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas cp2 where cp2.c_cct=cct.c_cct and monto>=0 and cp2.c_programa=1)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyofinaciero2, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps5 where cps5.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps5.c_sesion=4 and (cps5.seguimiento like '11,-' or cps5.seguimiento like '11,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '%,-11,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '14,-' or cps5.seguimiento like '14,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '%,-14,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '15,-' or cps5.seguimiento like '15,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '%,-15,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '16,-' or cps5.seguimiento like '16,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '%,-16,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '18,-' or cps5.seguimiento like '18,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '%,-18,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '19,-' or cps5.seguimiento like '19,-%' or cps5.seguimiento like '%,-19,-%') and cps5.c_programa=2)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyoespecie3, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps6 where cps6.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps6.c_sesion=4 and (cps6.seguimiento like '12,-' or cps6.seguimiento like '12,-%' or cps6.seguimiento like '%,-12,-%' or cps6.seguimiento like '13,-' or cps6.seguimiento like '13,-%' or cps6.seguimiento like '%,-13,-%' or cps6.seguimiento like '17,-' or cps6.seguimiento like '17,-%' or cps6.seguimiento like '%,-17,-%') and cps6.c_programa=2)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyotecnico3, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas cp3 where cp3.c_cct=cct.c_cct and monto>=0 and cp3.c_programa=2)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyofinaciero3, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps7 where cps7.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps7.c_sesion=4 and (cps7.seguimiento like '29,-' or cps7.seguimiento like '29,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '%,-29,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '32,-' or cps7.seguimiento like '32,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '%,-32,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '3,-' or cps7.seguimiento like '33,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '%,-33,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '34,-' or cps7.seguimiento like '34,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '%,-34,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '35,-' or cps7.seguimiento like '35,-%' or cps7.seguimiento like '%,-35,-%') and cps7.c_programa=4)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyoespecie4, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps8 where cps8.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps8.c_sesion=4 and (cps8.seguimiento like '30,-' or cps8.seguimiento like '30,-%' or cps8.seguimiento like '%,-30,-%' or cps8.seguimiento like '31,-' or cps8.seguimiento like '31,-%' or cps8.seguimiento like '%,-31,-%') and cps8.c_programa=4)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyotecnico4, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas cp4 where cp4.c_cct=cct.c_cct and monto>=0 and cp4.c_programa=4)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyofinaciero4, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps9 where cps9.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps9.c_sesion=4 and (cps9.seguimiento like '54,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '54,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-54,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '56,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '56,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-56,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '57,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '57,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-57,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '58,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '58,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-58,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '59,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '59,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-59,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '60,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '60,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-60,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '61,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '61,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-61,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '62,-' or cps9.seguimiento like '62,-%' or cps9.seguimiento like '%,-62,-%') and cps9.c_programa=7)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyoespecie5, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas_seguimiento cps10 where cps10.c_cct=cct.c_cct and cps10.c_sesion=4 and (cps10.seguimiento like '55,-' or cps10.seguimiento like '55,-%' or cps10.seguimiento like '%,-55,-%') and cps10.c_programa=7)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyotecnico5, case when ( select count(*) from ce_programas cp5 where cp5.c_cct=cct.c_cct and monto>=0 and cp5.c_programa=7)>=1 then 'X' else '' end as apoyofinaciero5 from c_cct cct where status_cct=1 and cct.c_cct =#{cCct}

select fuente, nvl( sum(recabado),0) as recabado, nvl( sum(ejercido),0) as ejercido from table( multiset(select case when fuente==1 then "Donaciones a la escuela de personas físicas o morales." when fuente==2 then "Recursos recabados por rifas o eventos organizados por la escuela." when fuente==3 or fuente==4 then "Aportaciones extraordinarias de los padres de familia." when fuente==5 then "Otros" else "" end fuente, monto1 as recabado, monto2 as ejercido from ce_actividad_detalle where c_cct=#{cCct} union select case when fuente_recursos==1 then "Donaciones a la escuela de personas físicas o morales." when fuente_recursos==2 then "Recursos recabados por rifas o eventos organizados por la escuela." when fuente_recursos==3 or fuente_recursos==4 then "Aportaciones extraordinarias de los padres de familia." when fuente_recursos==5 then "Otros" else "" end fuente, monto_r as recabado, monto_g as ejercido
from ce_eventos where c_cct=#{cCct})) group by fuente
select nvl( sum(monto),0) as totalrecabado, nvl( sum(recibido),0) as totalejercido from ce_programas where c_cct =#{cCct}

select nvl(sum(totalrecabado),0) as totalrecabado, nvl(sum(totalejercido),0) as totalejercido from table( multiset(select sum(monto_r)as totalrecabado,sum(monto_g) as totalejercido from ce_eventos where c_cct=#{cCct} union select sum (monto1) as totalrecabado,sum(monto2) as totalejercido from ce_actividad_detalle where c_cct=#{cCct} ))
